channel.title: Merlin

channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: ER
channel.desc: Dr. Greene is still having trouble dealing with cases in the ER and faces a medical review. Benton tells his mother that she must be placed in a nursing home. Deb's rivalry with Carter causes her to make a disastrous mistake.

channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: Mythbusters: There's Your Problem!
channel.desc: The MythBusters serve up a triple helping of food science in this explosive episode.

channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: My Family

channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: Officially Amazing
channel.desc: Ben meets the Moffatt brothers who are vying to break the record for the Tightest Parallel Park. The Space Cowboy whips roses from Ben's mouth. Al meets a cool skater dude and Haruka checks out a man who runs on all fours.

channel.name: ABC Comedy AU
channel.title: Rage
channel.desc: Australia's longest running music TV show, rage is home to the biggest vault of music videos from a diverse range of artists, genres and eras. We curate the best clips of all time to surprise and entertain you for hours.[(96057)]

channel.name: Arirang World KR
channel.title: DIPLOMAT'S ARCHIVE: HIDDEN STORIES
channel.desc: As of April 2025, S. Korea has established diplomatic relations with a total of 194 countries. Among them are countries that have had ties and exchanges with Korea for hundreds of years. With such long-standing relationships with so many nations, might there be fascinating hidden stories between Korea and the rest of the world that we don?t know yet? \"Diplomat?s Archives: Hidden Stories\" begins with this very question. Together with foreign embassies in Korea, the series uncovers and sheds light on meaningful yet lesser-known stories between Korea and other countries. Through this, we aim to reaffirm the deep friendships that have been built over time, highlight how countries are interconnected?bilaterally and multilaterally? and emphasize the importance of cooperation on the global stage today.

channel.title: PERFORMARTS RELOAD:NTOK
channel.desc: PerformArts Reload(Biweekly)?PerformArts Reload Season 4? takes you to the world of sage cultural arts! We are delighted to help you open your eyes to the new dynamics of K-cultures&arts, offering a variety of artsy stages in gugak, classical music, musicals, opera and traditional dance. ? #CulturalArts_Now #KCulturesnArts_WAVE -->.

channel.name: Arirang World KR
channel.title: THE KULTURE WAVE [L]
channel.desc: Riding on the Korean Wave! A culture news program that explores K-culture from all aspects with a variety of panelists and guests. Stay up to date on K-entertainment, K-trends, K-people, K-everything with \"the Kulture Wave\"!The Kulture Wave?Daily 14:00-14:30(KST). Kwon Soa.

channel.name: Arirang World KR
channel.title: NEWS GENERATION [R]
channel.desc: NEWs Generation is Arirang TV?s daily news program covering latest trends and current affairs affecting people in their twenties and thirties. It opens discussions with millennial and Gen Z panelists and experts who would like to share their insight and firsthand experience on various topics of interest.

channel.name: Arirang World KR
channel.title: REGIONAL TASTES: GYEONGGI
channel.desc: An archive video produced to record the local foods of various regions across South Korea. It shares stories about the recipe, history, and characteristics of each regional dish. ? ? VOD service is currently not available due to copyright issues.

channel.name: Arirang World KR
channel.title: K-ARTS ARTISTS
channel.desc: Connecting Artists? Today and Tomorrow.We share the stories of artists moving toward the future, while capturing the vibrant essence of the arts through performances, exhibitions, education, and creation, and conveying its inspiration and value.? VOD service is currently not available due to copyright issues.

channel.name: Arirang World KR
channel.title: EXPLORING KOREAN LITERATURE B
channel.desc:
2021 Exploring Korean Literature There is a growing interest in Korean literature among readers from around the world and so we bring Korean classics to Korean modern literature to viewers in this special series under three themes. What They?ve Read Well-known TV personalities read three translated works of Korean literature that have recently received attention. Kim Soom's novel \"One Left\", brings the comfort women issue to the forefront of the literary world, and her book is recited and discussed by Darcy Paquet, a translator and essayist for the film \"Parasite,\" and translator and essayist Colin Marshall, Italian architect Simone Carena, and fashion designer Shin Ji-hye. The novel was published in the U.S. in September 2020 and a second book print was released this year. Cho Nam-Joo's novel \"Kim Jiyoung, Born 1982\" has been translated into 25 languages and is recited by TV personality Daniel Hicks (UK), Carlos Gorito (Brazil), YouTuber Sarah Mack (USA) and singer Punita (India) who share their thoughts about the book. Howon, a member of the boy band, W24, recites passages from Kim Young-ha's novel \"Diary of a Murderer\" and gives commentary. Living to Tell a Story This documentary features Korean writers whose works are not only popular in Korea but also overseas. In episode 1, poet Kim Yi-deum, the Winner of the National Translation Award and the Lucien Stryk Award for her collection of poems, \"Hysteria,\" as well as Korean novelists Kim Cho-Yup and Kim Yeon-su appear to talk about the creative process and how they carry out research before writing a novel. In Episode 2, novelist Yun Ko-Eun, the winner of the Crime Fiction in Translation Dagger award for her book, \"The Disaster Tourist\", and novelist Ha Seong-nan and poet Jin Eun-young explain what they were trying to convey to readers through their works. In Episode 3, novelist Hwang Sok-young, whose works are mostly inspired by his own experience of living in modern Korean society, tells the story of his life and literary journey. A Word Depicted in Stories The cultural characteristics in Korean literature that encompasses Korean classics to modern novels are highlighted on this show. Six episodes with different themes ranging from female poets in classical literature, makeup culture, wine and arts, tea ceremony, pets, and a literary discussion forum will begin airing on November 5th. -->
.

channel.desc: As of April 2025, S. Korea has established diplomatic relations with a total of 194 countries. Among them are countries that have had ties and exchanges with Korea for hundreds of years. With such long-standing relationships with so many nations, might there be fascinating hidden stories between Korea and the rest of the world that we don?t know yet? \"Diplomat?s Archives: Hidden Stories\" begins with this very question. Together with foreign embassies in Korea, the series uncovers and sheds light on meaningful yet lesser-known stories between Korea and other countries. Through this, we aim to reaffirm the deep friendships that have been built over time, highlight how countries are interconnected?bilaterally and multilaterally? and emphasize the importance of cooperation on the global stage today.

A Word Depicted in Stories The cultural characteristics in Korean literature that encompasses Korean classics to modern novels are highlighted on this show. channel.name: Arirang World KR
channel.title: K-CHAT: CONVERSING IN KOREAN
channel.desc: \"What would you say in Korean in a situation like this?\" Discover how to express yourself in various daily life situations in Korean, from greetings and making friends to making promises and ordering your favorite food. A comprehensive Korean program designed to teach Korean language through real-life situations! A global initiative featuring top performers. Benefit from clear and friendly explanations by Peter Vint, a British TV personality who mastered Korean himself. Engage in lively Korean language lessons taught by Korean-American idols Aaron and Alexa! Experience a delightful Korean language course that delves into culture, trends, and even generational nuances. Each lesson is a concise 10-minute package, including scenarios, explanations, and practical exercises. Enjoy short, yet entertaining content that will also provide insight into culture, trends, and generational diversity. With just a glance, you'll be able to speak Korean fluently. Embark on an enjoyable and refreshing journey through our Korean language course.

channel.name: Arirang World KR
channel.title: K-CHAT: TRAVEL IN KOREA
channel.desc: Simple and Fun Korean Lessons, ?K-Chat: Travel in Korea? What are the most useful expressions visitors to Korea can use right away?From arriving at the airport to finding your hotel and exploring popular travel destinations, this program offers practical expressions for your Korean language journey. It also covers traditional Korean culture and essential travel information, making it an invaluable resource for beginner to intermediate learners! Discover Korean travel expressions in an engaging and entertaining way with skits performed by ONF?s Hyo-jin, Seung-jun, Wyatt, and Alexa. With clear and accessible explanations from Hye-rim of the Wonder Girls, a graduate of Hankuk University of Foreign Studies, you?ll systematically improve your Korean!

Taking you back to three hours before the live broadcast, witness the exciting yet nerve-racking moments from the waiting room, the rookies? youthful charms towards the global fans, and exclusive behind-the-scenes from the rehearsal! Who will become the next rookie idol group to take over the K-Pop market? Find out on .

channel.name: Arirang World KR
channel.title: EXPLORING KOREAN LITERATURE B
channel.desc:
2021 Exploring Korean Literature There is a growing interest in Korean literature among readers from around the world and so we bring Korean classics to Korean modern literature to viewers in this special series under three themes. What They?ve Read Well-known TV personalities read three translated works of Korean literature that have recently received attention. Kim Soom's novel \"One Left\", brings the comfort women issue to the forefront of the literary world, and her book is recited and discussed by Darcy Paquet, a translator and essayist for the film \"Parasite,\" and translator and essayist Colin Marshall, Italian architect Simone Carena, and fashion designer Shin Ji-hye. The novel was published in the U.S. in September 2020 and a second book print was released this year. Cho Nam-Joo's novel \"Kim Jiyoung, Born 1982\" has been translated into 25 languages and is recited by TV personality Daniel Hicks (UK), Carlos Gorito (Brazil), YouTuber Sarah Mack (USA) and singer Punita (India) who share their thoughts about the book. Howon, a member of the boy band, W24, recites passages from Kim Young-ha's novel \"Diary of a Murderer\" and gives commentary. Living to Tell a Story This documentary features Korean writers whose works are not only popular in Korea but also overseas. In episode 1, poet Kim Yi-deum, the Winner of the National Translation Award and the Lucien Stryk Award for her collection of poems, \"Hysteria,\" as well as Korean novelists Kim Cho-Yup and Kim Yeon-su appear to talk about the creative process and how they carry out research before writing a novel. In Episode 2, novelist Yun Ko-Eun, the winner of the Crime Fiction in Translation Dagger award for her book, \"The Disaster Tourist\", and novelist Ha Seong-nan and poet Jin Eun-young explain what they were trying to convey to readers through their works. In Episode 3, novelist Hwang Sok-young, whose works are mostly inspired by his own experience of living in modern Korean society, tells the story of his life and literary journey. A Word Depicted in Stories The cultural characteristics in Korean literature that encompasses Korean classics to modern novels are highlighted on this show. Six episodes with different themes ranging from female poets in classical literature, makeup culture, wine and arts, tea ceremony, pets, and a literary discussion forum will begin airing on November 5th. -->
.

channel.desc: Along with the strengthened manufacturing capabilities of various countries all around the world, \"Smart Factory\" has garnered a lot of attention in the global market. Moreover, a domestic major company Samsung Electronics has provided a smart factory solution in order to boost mutual growth with small and medium-sized businesses. channel.desc: A collection of interesting and previously unseen finds from the show's travels round the country, visiting St Albans, Wolverhampton Art Gallery, the Platform in Morecambe and Grimsby Minster. Paul Martin also visits Coughton Court in Warwickshire.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Only Connect
channel.desc: Victoria Coren Mitchell hosts the quiz where knowledge only gets you so far. One team correctly guesses the fourth in the sequence after just two clues. One team correctly guesses the fourth in the sequence after just two clues: master and ultra.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Once Upon a Time in Space
channel.desc: After the fall of the Soviet Union, a crown jewel of communism still survives: the Soviet space station, Mir, a final outpost of a fallen empire. But the country's space program is fighting for survival, and the US government is concerned that Russian rocket scientists, with their valuable nuclear knowledge, might be recruited by 'rogue states'. America responds to this situation with the Shuttle-Mir Programme: US astronauts train in Russia and live aboard Mir for months at a time.

Finally, in the Karoo of South Africa, the serval thrives amongst the futuristic landscape of Africa's biggest industrial complex.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Mary at 90: A Lifetime of Cooking
channel.desc: Sports broadcaster Gabby Logan joins Dame Mary in the kitchen to cook some of her standout time-saving recipes. Gabby asks Mary to share her own tales of being a working mum 50 years ago - the early days when Mary was one of the first TV cooks. Gabby is keen to cook, and she has come to the right place, because from the start of her career, the core of Mary's focus has been helping busy, working families with simple dishes for when time is short.

channel.name: BBC Two NL

channel.desc: From Port Talbot to Hollywood, Sir Anthony Hopkins talks about the craft and the characters that define his 60-year career on screen and the private struggles he has faced behind the scenes.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Tropic of Cancer with Simon Reeve
channel.desc: This episode takes Simon through Bangladesh and on a perilous covert journey into Burma, where western journalists are banned. In Bangladesh, Simon sails down the mighty Padma River and visits fishermen who use trained otters to drive fish into their nets. From North East India, Simon treks through jungles into Burma to meet the Chin people - an ethnic group who are oppressed by the Burmese government.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Lucy Worsley Investigates
channel.desc: On November 5th 1605, a group of conspirators planned to blow up parliament. Lucy Worsley investigates the Gunpowder Plot, asking what drove them to this radical act of extremism.

channel.name: BBC Two NL
channel.title: Cunk on Earth
channel.desc: Cunk continues her ambitious march across the face of mankind into an age of industry and science. With the help of historians, and a science-historian, she explains the scientific breakthroughs of Marie Curie and Albert Einstein. She demonstrates the inventions that changed the world, and covers how the US Civil War, World War I and World War II taught humanity how to use its new grasp of technology to shoot, blow up and irradiate itself in huge numbers.

channel.desc: In an effort to provide extensive coverage of worldwide financial markets, Bloomberg features several regional shows under the "Bloomberg Markets" banner, with each focusing on that geographic area's markets. This Asian-focused version is hosted by Shery Ahn, David Ingles, Haidi Lun, Rishaad Salamat and Angie Lau. Analysis, commentary, interviews and interactive graphics are among the staples of the show that help viewers understand the impact the technology sector has on the economy. The show, which was originally titled "Bloomberg West," is anchored by Emily Chang in San Francisco.

channel.desc: It's our spookiest special yet, as we're in a creepy castle for Halloween! Expect pumpkin carving with a Blue Peter twist and DIY costume ideas from online superstar Little Jem. And can Shini and Abby survive a night in a haunted house.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Stage Stars
channel.desc: There is a buzz around the school as the Anything Goes cast list is finally revealed. Will Lucas get the part of Moonface, a role usually reserved for the older years? Best friends Uma and Anna are both hoping for the lead, but will they be happy with their parts? Meanwhile, singer Max has been busy writing new songs over the summer, and his dreams of life as a pop star are ever closer as he releases new music.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Cooking Buddies
channel.desc: Buddy and Conker are joined by amazing Irish dancer and Kidz Bop British Sign Language interpreter Maisie! She needs Buddy?s help to make something tasty for her dancer friends to top them up after their energetic rehearsals. The only food that can jump as high as Maisie can are pancakes! So, Buddy makes bright green spinach pancakes stacked between layers of ham and an oozy cheese sauce - delicious and sure to knock the socks off her dancer friends! She can have it ready to go before dance class and simply pop it in the oven when she gets home. Maisie teaches Buddy to fingerspell his name in British Sign Language, and he tries to walk in Maisie?s very fast footsteps as he has a go at Irish dancing. Join Buddy, Conker and Maisie as they make a pancake stack that?s flippin? delicious and will be sure to put a spring in your step, too! You can get all of Buddy?s recipes, and loads more, at bbc.co.uk\/food.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: So Awkward
channel.desc: Lily finds a diary in Mugshotsz which is all about the owner's dream girl, beside a photo of Lily surrounded by love hearts. This confirms it - Lily must be the secret crush. When head boy of Cranmede, Hunter Phillips, turns up to claim his diary, Lily can't believe it. Thrown by how tall and handsome Hunter is, Lily has to remind herself she has a boyfriend. How can she let Hunter down without smashing his heart to bits? It?s Amazing Women Who Changed the World week. Martha and Kat compete to have a statue of their chosen Amazing Woman erected in the school. Whoever has the most signatures, wins. Kat champions Karren Brady and Martha champions physicist Ida Noddack. Still believing Hunter has a crush on her and in front of Rob, Lily tell Hunter that his 'crush' will never go out with him. Hunter thinks she means Martha and given how angry Martha is with him, he is forced to agree with Lily.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danny and Mick
channel.desc: All the Pottsfield Leisure Centre staff are raising money for Comic Relief. Danny and Lance, as always, turn it into a competition to see which of them can raise the most money! But between Danny?s disastrously defective charity calendar, and Mick?s frankly frightening fancy dress, the brothers only succeed in driving the totaliser lower than when they started. It?s going to take everybody putting aside their rivalries and working together as a team to turn this situation around. That, and a lot of soggy sponges.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Danny and Mick
channel.desc: Naomi is stressing out about running her first kids party at the leisure centre, and Danny and Mick aren?t helping ? especially after they accidently make Walter Whizz the party entertainer 'magically vanish'. With a host of kids desperate for a pirate party, there is only one thing for it - boys and girls, please welcome Captain Danny the Pirate Magician and his lovely assistant Mick.

channel.name: CBBC UK

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Deadly 60
channel.desc: In Thailand, Steve comes face-to-face with the longest venomous snake in the world, the king cobra, whose bite could kill an elephant. He meets two of Thailand's killer cats for a deadly cat face-off, but which one will make it onto his list? Finally he dons his climbing gear to scale a building in Bangkok to illustrate the abilities of one of the world's best climbers, who is deadly with it.

channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Operation Ouch!
channel.desc: To investigate why tummy rumbles are so loud when you?re hungry, the doctors call in the supersized stomach of Mega Xand! When Dr Chris and Dr Xand count down the Top 5 Bizarre-est Body Parts You Never Knew You Had, you will discover that the mysterious palmaris longus is so bizarre that you might not have it at all! The big question in Ouchology is whether it will be Dr Chris, Dr Xand or Dr Ronx who gets snotted by their kid quizmasters. If the doctors can put all the organs in the right place on their own bodies, they could win enough points to avoid the snot - but someone has to come last! Elsewhere, for Investigation Ouch!, Dr Chris finds out why real doctors are doing fake operations on fake organs inside fake patients in Nottingham. At the emergency department in Edinburgh, Alice has hurt her head and arm by accidentally running into a fence. And when Finlay arrives with burns on his forearms, the medics think it might have something to do with parsnips.

We're at the finish line to see Pheidippides run the first ever marathon, then we count down the top marathon cheats of all time and take a look back at some of our favourite Horrible Histories sporting events.

With the HQ in sight and minutes to spare, DM's 'CCD' takes hold at the worst possible moment, and he abandons the mission in order to battle an army of bounty hunters. channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: DIY Deadly with Steve Backshall
channel.desc: In this unprecedented time of lockdown there has never been a better time to learn about the wildlife around us, and Deadly 60 fans have been sending in their videos, photos and questions for Steve Backshall to answer. In this episode Steve explores our aerial assassins, and judging by CBBC?s most observant viewers, the skies above us are home to a huge variety of deadly animals! Steve unravels the mysteries of a bird nest and a feather collection, explains that kites are spreading far and wide, and how to bring birds to your bird table without making them dinner themselves! In a DIY demo, Steve then shows us how to make fat ball dessert for our feathered friends, before basking in butterfly, bee and wasp glory! But that?s not all. The audience gets their chance to Beat Backshall in a 60 second quickfire round. The question is, how many can Steve get right before his time is up? In a fun-filled, fast and furious 13 minutes, we?ll also get to see some of the best bits from 13 years of deadly exploration. In this episode Steve gets hunted down by a silent forest predator, and catches the world?s biggest and most feisty wasp.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: This Is CBeebies
channel.desc: This Is CBeebies. Programmes start at 6.00am.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Vegesaurs
channel.desc: Chillipede Chase. Split follows a glowing Chillipede into the Spooky Forest and gets lost in a tree maze.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Bing
channel.desc: Mine. Children's animation. Bing and Pando are tired but insist on one last game of hide-and-seek. Pando hides in Bing's bed, but by the time Bing finds him he is fast asleep.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Teletubbies
channel.desc: Bunny Rabbits. Preschool series. Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po watch bunny rabbits. Bunny ears and tails appear on the Teletubbies, who do the bunny hop hop.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Supertato
channel.desc: Veggies Gotta Dance. Supertato and Evil Pea face each other in a dance-off so Supertato can rescue his friends.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Roots and Fruits
channel.desc: Pineapple. Live from the Roots and Fruits theatre, it's the magical Pineapple.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Tee and Mo
channel.desc: Perfume. Tee decides to make Mo some perfume from ingredients found around the house. Lucky Mo.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Bing
channel.desc: Bus Ride. The seaside bus breaks down, but Bing still finds a way to have fun.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Colourblocks
channel.desc: A Colourful Journey. The Colourblocks travel through Colourland on an airship, picking up new and old friends along the way.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Hey Duggee
channel.desc: The Castle Badge. Animated preschool series. The Squirrels hear an echoing voice coming from the top of a castle's spooky tower. Someone is calling them - but who is it.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Hey Duggee
channel.desc: The Breakfast Badge. Tag is feeling grumpy because he didn't eat his breakfast. Luckily, Duggee has his Breakfast Badge, and soon the Squirrels will too.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Bluey
channel.desc: Turtle Boy. Bingo finds a toy turtle at the playground and wants to take him home.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Bluey
channel.desc: Fancy Restaurant. Bingo and Bluey set up a romantic evening for Mum and Dad at their fancy restaurant.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Go Jetters
channel.desc: The Pan-American Highway, Panama. The team must protect a sloth from Glitch's plan to build a road through the Darien Gap.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Peter Rabbit
channel.desc: The Tale of Dr Bobtail's Adventure. Animated series. When Squirrel Nutkin feels too poorly to move, the rabbits must sneak Dr Bobtail on to Owl Island.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Octonauts
channel.desc: Arctic Blizzard. When a blizzard hits, Captain Barnacles will need to use all his Arctic survival tactics.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Numberblocks
channel.desc: Double Duets. It's time for karaoke in Numberland. A nervous One discovers that doubling up is a great way to have a friend by your side - and it makes singing twice as fun.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Alphablocks
channel.desc: Rainbow. The adventures of 26 lively letters who can make words come to life. When they find a musical rainbow, the Alphablocks sing and dance their way to a multicoloured land.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Nick Cope's Popcast
channel.desc: I've Lost My Bobble Hat. While sorting through his hats, Nick realises his favourite hat is missing. Can today's Popcast song help him find it.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Justin's House
channel.desc: Dustomatic 3000. Justin Fletcher entertains with singing, dancing and comedy. Justin accidentally throws away Robert's favourite duster, so Justin tries to cheer him up.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Bing
channel.desc: Birthday. It's Bing's third birthday, but there's trouble when he teaches his friends the waka-oke.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Yakka Dee!
channel.desc: Moon. Dee encourages a friend to say 'moon', and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. Before we say good night to the moon, we see a bright moon, a light moon and even a tickly moon.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Lu & the Bally Bunch
channel.desc: Uncle Lorcan. Lu gets jealous when Biba hits it off with Uncle Lorcan.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Piggy Builders
channel.desc: Back of the Net. The Piggies help Keith play with his ball, but their mistakes lead to damage everywhere. Things get so bad that Wilf confiscates the ball. Keith can't play? Impossible.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Twirlywoos
channel.desc: More About Underneath. Stop-motion preschool programme. The Twirlywoos are in a warehouse, underneath a cardboard box, when a man tries to load them into a lorry.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Something Special
channel.desc: Let's Go Camping. Justin and Mr Tumble go on their own camping adventures.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Teletubbies
channel.desc: Tickly. Preschool series. The Teletubbies enjoy doing Round and Round the Garden, especially the end of the rhyme where they all tickle each other.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: The Baby Club
channel.desc: Cup. Giovanna and Baby Bear invite babies and their grown-ups to explore cups through discovery, play, song and story.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: I Spy, You Spy
channel.desc: Hairdressers. Elsee plays I spy in the hair salon with her new friend, Royalty.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Maddie & Triggs
channel.desc: Sunflowers. Maddie is upset when she discovers that her sunflower has not grown as tall as everyone else's. What could possibly be holding back this little flower from saying yes.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Dylan's Playtime Adventures
channel.desc: Astronaut on a Mission. Dylan the space commander wants to protect the planets, but when one of Saturn's rings falls off, it's going to take the whole crew to set things right.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Kiri and Lou
channel.desc: A Lovely Nap. Lou has a series of misadventures whilst fast asleep, so Kiri exhausts herself trying to keep him safe.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Vegesaurs
channel.desc: Hibernation. Ginger and the Pea-Rexes accidentally wake up a Kiwimammuthus during a snowball fight.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Bluey
channel.desc: Can Grannies dance? Now they need to video call Nana to get the answer.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Hey Duggee
channel.desc: The Carrot Badge. The Squirrels are admiring Duggee's crop of giant carrots when they hear a noise. They find the Rabbits busy preparing for the Carrot Solstice.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: The Game Catchers
channel.desc: A Mushroom to Help. The Game Catchers play a game of cops and robbers.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Timmy Time
channel.desc: Timmy's Treasure Trail. Animated adventures of a young lamb at nursery school. Harriet and Osbourne lay a treasure trail for the class, but Kid spoils the fun by eating the clues.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Our Family
channel.desc: Eden and Ava Are Superheroes! Eden and Ava pretend to be superheroes! They go on a mission to rescue a toy that's become lost in the woods. But will the heroes find the toy and save the day.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: My World Kitchen
channel.desc: Kay's Polish Dill Pickle Soup. Kay has invited his friends to taste his Polish dill pickle soup, which he serves in baked bread rolls with cream on top.

channel.name: CBeebies UK
channel.title: Teeny Tiny Creatures with Chantelle and Rory

After three years on death row, Alex is electrocuted in a messy execution and shortly after, his guardian crow appears and resurrects him. With the help of Lauren's sister Erin (Kirsten Dunst), the Crow begins his hunt for the killer.

channel.title: Euronews La Quotidienne
channel.desc: Ce journal matinal rend compte des ?v?nements qui, dans le monde entier, font bouger les esprits. Les reporters sur place sont int?gr?s par des ?missions en direct, de sorte que le t?l?spectateur est toujours au plus pr?s de l'action pour obtenir les nouvelles les plus r?centes. En outre, des experts analysent et commentent les ?v?nements respectifs.

channel.name: Fox News US
channel.title: Live: One Nation With Brian Kilmeade
channel.desc: In-depth analysis of the issues and stories that matter most to Americans while offering context and solutions to help bring the country together.

channel.name: Fox News US
channel.title: The Big Weekend Show
channel.desc: Rotating panelists discuss the big news of the day and react to the top stories.

channel.name: Fox News US
channel.title: The Big Weekend Show
channel.desc: Rotating panelists discuss the big news of the day and react to the top stories.

channel.name: Fox News US
channel.title: Life, Liberty & Levin
channel.desc: Mark Levin hosts FOX News Channel's "Life, Liberty and Levin." The program aims to explore the fundamental values and principles of American society, politics, culture, and current events and the impact that these things have on the nation's future and the everyday lives of the citizens. Levin also hosts "The Mark Levin Show," and prior to joining FOX, he served as an adviser to some of President Ronald Reagan's cabinet members.

channel.name: Fox News US
channel.title: FOX News Sunday
channel.desc: Anchor Shannon Bream interviews the biggest newsmakers of the week and leads guests in providing context and analysis of the issues facing Americans.

channel.name: Fox News US
channel.title: Sunday Night in America With Trey Gowdy
channel.desc: Insightful analysis and a new outlook on the latest issues facing the country, the former South Carolina Congressman utilizes his mixture of wisdom, humor and historical references to break down the latest legal and political news.

channel.name: Fox News US
channel.title: One Nation With Brian Kilmeade
channel.desc: In-depth analysis of the issues and stories that matter most to Americans while offering context and solutions to help bring the country together.

channel.name: Fox News US
channel.title: Live: FOX & Friends First
channel.desc: This early morning show is for people who enjoy the information they get from "FOX and Friends" but want it earlier. Todd Piro and Carley Shimkus host the show that requires them to get up at the crack of dawn. They report on the day's headlines while offering viewers the latest information regarding health, legal, political and lifestyle topics. Consider this the pregame show for the main "FOX and Friends" show that follows it.

channel.name: Fox News US
channel.title: Live: FOX and Friends
channel.desc: Co-hosts Steve Doocy, Ainsley Earhardt, Brian Kilmeade and Lawrence Jones highlight the latest in news, weather, sports and entertainment with a casual and spontaneous discourse.

channel.name: Fox News US
channel.title: Live: FOX and Friends
channel.desc: Co-hosts Steve Doocy, Ainsley Earhardt, Brian Kilmeade and Lawrence Jones highlight the latest in news, weather, sports and entertainment with a casual and spontaneous discourse.

channel.name: Fox News US
channel.title: Live: FOX and Friends
channel.desc: Co-hosts Steve Doocy, Ainsley Earhardt, Brian Kilmeade and Lawrence Jones highlight the latest in news, weather, sports and entertainment with a casual and spontaneous discourse.

channel.name: Fox News US
channel.title: Live: America's Newsroom
channel.desc: Bill Hemmer and Dana Perino cover current events happening around the nation and the world; guests pertinent to the news topics are interviewed and viewer emails are also answered by the anchors and guests.

channel.name: Fox News US
channel.title: Live: America's Newsroom
channel.desc: Bill Hemmer and Dana Perino cover current events happening around the nation and the world; guests pertinent to the news topics are interviewed and viewer emails are also answered by the anchors and guests.

channel.name: Fox News US
channel.title: Live: The Faulkner Focus
channel.desc: Emmy-winning journalist Harris Faulkner provides the latest news with insightful analysis and interviews with top newsmakers.

channel.name: Fox News US
channel.title: Live: Outnumbered
channel.desc: Approximately 51 percent of the U.S. population is made up of women, but on "Outnumbered" the female advantage jumps to a 4-1 ratio. The hourlong show features a rotating panel of four women and one man discussing the day's headlines from various perspectives. In addition to the top news of the hour, the panelists discuss leading pop culture and relationship issues making headlines that day. Regular FNC and FBN contributors appearing on the show on a rotational basis include Harris Faulkner, Meghan McCain and Pete Hegseth.

channel.name: Fox News US
channel.title: Live: America Reports
channel.desc: A look at the latest news and headlines with Sandra Smith and John Roberts.

channel.name: Fox News US
channel.title: Live: America Reports
channel.desc: A look at the latest news and headlines with Sandra Smith and John Roberts.

channel.name: Fox News US
channel.title: Live: The Story With Martha MacCallum
channel.desc: Martha MacCallum has been part of the Fox News family for a number of years but made the jump to prime time while chronicling the first 100 days of President Trump's administration. Now she's branching out to cover all of the happenings in the nation's capital on "The Story." She keeps viewers up-to-date on the critical decisions, political maneuvers and key developments coming out of D.C. Through interviews with guests and reports from the network's roster of correspondents, MacCallum goes in-depth on the stories that matter to viewers.

channel.name: Fox News US
channel.title: Live: The Will Cain Show
channel.desc: Featuring Cain's signature podcast style and thoughtful perspective through conversations with newsmakers across politics, culture and sports.

channel.name: Fox News US
channel.title: Live: The Five
channel.desc: The Five, co-hosted by Dana Perino, Greg Gutfeld and Jesse Watters and rotating liberal co-hosts Jessica Tarlov and Harold Ford Jr. is a roundtable opinion program featuring an ensemble of five rotating network personalities who discuss and debate the hot issues across the spectrum from politics to pop culture. The hosts also conclude each show by selecting a topic of their choice for the "One More Thing" segment.

channel.name: Fox News US
channel.title: Live: Special Report With Bret Baier
channel.desc: Former Fox News chief White House correspondent Bret Baier hosts this live weeknight newscast that places an emphasis on political stories from Washington, D.C.[(96057)]

channel.desc: Join skilled hunter-gatherer Peter Peeti, for another exciting hunting season. Pete is in the Tasman region, with a group of teenagers who are learning how to hunt and provide for their families. (R).[(96057)]

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Three Wiser Men And A Boy
channel.desc: The Brenner brothers are back and putting on a holiday pageant for young Thomas, while trying to cope with life's curveballs, including their mum's new boyfriend.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Holiday Touchdown
channel.desc: Chiefs superfan Alana tries to win the Fan of the Year Award as a Christmas gift for her family, falling in love with someone from the Chiefs' front office along the way.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Christmas Intern
channel.desc: Newly retired Cecelia visits her daughter, Alexis, who owns an online gift-giving business and becomes an intern. Together, they learn the meaning of Christmas, one gift at a time.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Twas The Night Before Christmas
channel.desc: Eager to break into directing, former actress Madison takes charge of a town's annual Christmas Eve play.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Christmas Cookie Catastrophe
channel.desc: Annie faces her first obstacle as CEO of Cooper's Cookies when grandma's secret recipe is stolen! Can she and local baker Sam recreate the beloved recipe.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Mystery On Mistletoe Lane
channel.desc: Heidi discovers a Christmas mystery in her historic home. Local handyman and historian David helps along the way, finding his own surprising connection.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Believe In Christmas
channel.desc: When Beatrice reluctantly joins her best friend on a trip to the enchanting Christmasland, she remains sceptical. But festive traditions and a friendly stranger warms her heart.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Great Christmas Switch
channel.desc: A single city girl decides to switch places for Christmas in an effort to get away from their problems for a little while. Romantic comedy.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Our Holiday Story
channel.desc: A loving couple shares the story of how they met and fell in love when their daughter's boyfriend comes to meet them for the first time at Christmas.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: The Finnish Line
channel.desc: Inspired by her father's legacy, Anya enters Finland's Joulurauha race. Partnered with a new dog, she faces challenges, her father's rival and her own anxieties.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Mystic Christmas
channel.desc: A woman reconnects with the owner of a pizza shop while working at a rehabilitation centre and an aquarium during the holidays.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Sugarplummed
channel.desc: When Emily wishes for a perfect Christmas like the ones found in the popular Sugarplum movies, she's shocked when Sugarplum herself appears to help her fulfil it.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Teleshopping
channel.desc: Teleshopping.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Teleshopping
channel.desc: Teleshopping.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Teleshopping
channel.desc: Teleshopping.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Teleshopping
channel.desc: Teleshopping.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Deck The Halls On Cherry...
channel.desc: Three generations on Cherry Lane experience life-changing Christmases, from a mistaken address leading to a live TV special, to a family facing their last holiday together.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: We Wish You A Married Christmas
channel.desc: Taking advice from their marriage coach, a struggling couple go to a quiet town to reconnect at Christmas. Can they rekindle their flame.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Maple Valley Christmas
channel.desc: Rancher Erica has spent her whole life working the family farm with her mother and sister. But when Aaron arrives, she starts to question what it is she actually wants.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Christmas On Call
channel.desc: The lives of various first responders in Philadelphia intersect over the holiday season while juggling work, personal lives and their dedication to protect and serve their city.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Time For Him To Come...
channel.desc: Elizabeth receives a voicemail that wasn't meant for her four days before Christmas. Can she get this man's heartfelt message to the love of his life in time.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Happy Holidays From Cherry Lane
channel.desc: In three intertwined timelines, different generations of one family navigate holiday challenges, from caring for an aging father to planning a Christmas Eve wedding.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: A Carol For Two
channel.desc: When talented singer Violette takes a job as a waitress in New York, things get complicated when her duet partner sets her up with a friend but starts developing feelings himself.

channel.name: Movies 24 UK
channel.title: Season's Greetings From...
channel.desc: Across three different eras, different families occupy a family home, leaving their own festive mark throughout the years despite life's challenges.[(96057)]

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Biz Stream
channel.desc: This upbeat program combines business and economic news with in-depth feature stories that give you a closer look at the latest trends within Japan and around the world.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Matsuri: The Heartbeat Of Japan
channel.desc: Inami Shishimai is a type of lion dance performed in Toyama Prefecture. Here, the shishi symbolizes the harshness and bounty of the natural world, and the matsuri focuses on the importance of harmony between people and nature. Adults play the role of the enormous shishi while a child is the shishi-tori, whose job is to pacify the shishi with sacred objects. This event is also an opportunity for local families to wish for happy marriages and children, and the shishi dances in celebration.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japan Delish
channel.desc: Crisp, hot and delicious Japanese gyoza! How did gyoza come to be so beloved in Japan? Taste the delicious truth for yourself.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nun's Cookbook
channel.desc: The temple chefs show us how to make su-no-mono with dried daikon radish. Just mix rehydrated daikon with red radish and sweet vinegar, and this tasty pink-colored dish is ready to serve.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Hometown Stories
channel.desc: Nishino Masatoshi didn't know what he wanted to do with his life until he learned about horse logging. Now, he's chasing his dream in the forests of Hokkaido with the help of his trusty sidekick, Kap.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Satoyama Kitchen Summer #5
channel.desc: At the Satoyama Kitchen guesthouse in Hida Takayama, chef Nobuko, her cameraman husband Makoto and their cat Tama take us on a tasty journey of local cuisine served with a side of seasonal scenery.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Herbal Symphony
channel.desc: Autumn in Japan's oldest private medicinal herb garden in Uda, Nara Prefecture. As the plants bear fruit, the garden's custodians protect the seeds, ensuring that they live on for future generations.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The Beauty Of Japanese Swords: Famous Masterpieces
channel.desc: This time, two naginata (polearms) associated with legendary warriors: Benkei and Tomoe Gozen.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time Lapse Journey
channel.desc: Kyoto in the autumn: the old capital is even more beautiful when dressed in fall colors. Witness the contemplative and quiet beauty of Kyoto through time-lapse photography.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Where We Call Home
channel.desc: We meet two crafters of bespoke fashion in Tokyo - German Melanie Uematsu whose specialties include wedding gowns for non-Japanese customers, and Australian Thom O?Brien who creates handmade hats.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Cinematic Journey
channel.desc: Kyle Card hikes along the 1,000km trail following the Pacific Coast in northern Japan, where he discovers local lifestyles, stunning nature, traces of the area's 2011 disaster, and resilient people.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The Masterpieces Of Ukiyo E Producer Tsutaju
channel.desc: This miniseries presents the masterpieces of Tsutaju, a brilliant ukiyo-e producer of the Edo period. This episode spotlights artist Sharaku's debut work \"The Actor Otani Oniji III as Edobei.\.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Magical Japanese
channel.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history and culture. This episode focuses on words related to doro, or mud. Since ancient times, Japanese people have gotten muddy in the rice paddies, cultivating their main staple. Perhaps because of this, there are a surprising number of expressions related to mud in Japanese. And reflecting such a place of hard work, many of them are used in business situations. From his home in Kyoto Prefecture, poet and literary translator Peter MacMillan guides us through unique words born from \"mud.\.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Easy Japanese
channel.desc: Learn how to say where you're from. The formula is the name of the place, followed by \"kara kimashita\".

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Culture Crossroads
channel.desc: In Edogawa City, where 40% of Tokyo's Indian population resides, a cultural exchange program gives Japanese residents the chance to visit Indian homes as well as facilities run by Indians.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Hello! Nhk World Japan
channel.desc: Cycle Around Japan has teamed up with Taiwan's public broadcaster, PTS, for a three-part series airing this fall. Experience Taiwan's lush scenery, and meet guardians of traditional culture.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: The World Heritage Sites In Japan
channel.desc: From natural landscapes to historic architecture representing centuries of cultural development, Japan's World Heritage sites offer a wide range of glimpses into history and the beauty of nature.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Yonezawa: Shirabu Onsen
channel.desc: A 700-year-old hot spring, Shirabu Onsen, is maintained via daily trips up the slopes of the 2,000-meter mountain where it sits. See the hot spring's guardian at work, in gorgeous time-lapse footage.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Seasoning The Seasons
channel.desc: Traveling across Japan, we can find many bridges of all shapes and sizes. In Tokyo, building modern bridges was one way to join the club of advanced industrial nations in the late 19th century, when Japan was vying to catch up with Western technology. A small bridge in Iwate Prefecture is hand-made. Even if relatively few people use it, it is an important crossing for the local community. Today, we hear the story of bridges linking communities throughout Japan.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Info
channel.desc: No description available.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Seasoning The Seasons
channel.desc: Traveling across Japan, we can find many bridges of all shapes and sizes. In Tokyo, building modern bridges was one way to join the club of advanced industrial nations in the late 19th century, when Japan was vying to catch up with Western technology. A small bridge in Iwate Prefecture is hand-made. Even if relatively few people use it, it is an important crossing for the local community. Today, we hear the story of bridges linking communities throughout Japan.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Matsuri: The Heartbeat Of Japan
channel.desc: Inami Shishimai is a type of lion dance performed in Toyama Prefecture. Here, the shishi symbolizes the harshness and bounty of the natural world, and the matsuri focuses on the importance of harmony between people and nature. Adults play the role of the enormous shishi while a child is the shishi-tori, whose job is to pacify the shishi with sacred objects. This event is also an opportunity for local families to wish for happy marriages and children, and the shishi dances in celebration.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Magical Japanese
channel.desc: The Japanese language is rich in words and expressions influenced by nature, history and culture. This episode focuses on words related to doro, or mud. Since ancient times, Japanese people have gotten muddy in the rice paddies, cultivating their main staple. Perhaps because of this, there are a surprising number of expressions related to mud in Japanese. And reflecting such a place of hard work, many of them are used in business situations. From his home in Kyoto Prefecture, poet and literary translator Peter MacMillan guides us through unique words born from \"mud.\.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Journeys In Japan
channel.desc: In 1859, when Japan reopened its doors after more than two centuries of isolation, goods flowed in and out of newly expanded ports. At the time, raw silk became the country's largest export, as the silk industries in France and Italy had been hit by an epidemic of silkworm disease. At one point, Japan was the world's biggest exporter. On this episode of Journeys in Japan, Sheila Cliffe from the UK follows the Silk Road from northern Kanto, once a major production area, to Yokohama, where the silk took off to the world.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
channel.desc: The Great East Japan Earthquake in 2011 and its resulting tsunami caused the accident at the Fukushima Daiichi Nuclear Power Plant. The worst nuclear accident in Japan's history suffered from a lack of information due to the inaccessibility of the reactor buildings. For this reason, \"disaster response robots\" were deployed to take pictures and measure radiation doses inside the buildings. In the aftermath of a major disaster like that as well as an earthquake or fire, robots can quickly enter dangerous sites that are inaccessible to humans, find people in need of rescue, and take detailed measurements to provide data about the site. In this episode, we'll look at the latest developments among Japan's \"disaster response robots.\.

channel.desc: On a hectic shipping day, Nia volunteers to deliver a missed shipment , but soon finds herself embarrassed to admit that the delivery has been anything but.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Mr. Crocodile
channel.desc: Lydia meets Daisy's imaginary friend in 'Pretend Friend', then in 'Croc Outta Water', Mr. Crocodile fish sits for Martin.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Isa's throwing a party where everyone will be dancing in 'The Rainforest Ritmo', then in 'The Magic Nut', Dora leads everyone into the Tricky Trappy Forest to recover Tico's magic nut.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Chickaletta is left driving the train in 'Pups Save the Chicken Conductor', then in 'Pups Save the Digi-Tal Stylists', Digi & Tal volunteer at the Pet Parlour.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: While saving Travis, the pups find something else in 'Pups Save the Elephant Spa', then in 'Pups Save an Underwater Otis', Otis gets trapped in a sunken container.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: The kids become the parents and the parents become the kids.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: When Tommy enters his first Rocket Race, Tim does all he can to support his brother.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Real Pup Squad
channel.desc: We meet Kaiden and his Siberian Husky, Luca, as they join The Real Pup Squad! Their mission? To rescue two alpacas stranded in the garden's snowy zones.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: Rubble & Crew help Hadley's hotel guests in 'The Crew Builds a Hotel Elevator', then in 'The Crew Builds a Popcorn-Cat Cafe', Cafe Carl has a case of kitten chaos.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: Blaze and his pals are gearing up for a big race with brand new tyres! But Crusher tricks Starla, Darington and Stripes into putting on out-of-control silly tyres.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Super Duper Bunny League
channel.desc: The bunnies discover a haunted house in 'Ghosts!', and then in 'The Gobbler!', the team goes undercover at a Gala.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: On a tour of the Elf Factory, the Elf and Fairy children learn about recycling and see how rubbish is re-used. When the factory runs out of material, they set out to find some more.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Wandy gets a cold and is taken ill, Holly is given a replacement wand. This new wand can do lots of things that Wandy can't, and soon becomes the favourite.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim, Tommy & Tia find a lost toy and vow to return it to its owner.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim, Kai and Tommy try to get their ball back from Mum's bedroom.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim, Tommy and Tia take on their parents at Tailball.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Boots needs to rescue Isa on their 'Friendaversary Adventure', then in 'Swiper's Birthday Surprise', Dora brings a gift to a Swiper's party and must stop him from swiping his own gift.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: More friendly adventures in Gabby's Dollhouse.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and George have been sailing with Granny and Grandpa Pig. Back at the clubhouse, they discover a jukebox - but it is very noisy.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and her friends are at playgroup when Mr. Bull arrives to do some noisy work - he is building a windmill, to make electricity! The children join in and make their own windmills too.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Today is Mandy Mouse's birthday, and as a special treat, Mandy is going to Cheese World with her friends. It is the most fun ever.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It is a lovely, sunny day. Peppa and George have come to the seaside. It's a perfect time for everyone to make sandcastles, with a moat, a bridge, and a visitor.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: While the playground is getting rebuilt, Daddy Pig teaches the children some simple science.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It's school project time for Peppa and her friends which means they have to build castles and bring them into playgroup.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Police Officer Panda and Police Officer Squirrel have come to teach Peppa and her friends all about bicycle safety.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Madame Gazelle takes the children on a trip to the Zoo where they get a tour from the zookeepers; Mr Lion, Mrs Crocodile and Mr Giraffe.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy Pig takes Peppa to the doctors for her yearly health check up with Dr Polar Bear, who checks her height, weight, ears, mouth and heartbeat and more.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Grandpa Pig is taking Peppa and George sailing, but they keep getting stuck in the mud.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It is Molly Mole's first day at school and she quickly makes best friends with Peppa and Rebecca Rabbit.

channel.title: Jen a Jim a'r Cywiadur
channel.desc: Mae'r criw yn dod ar draws arth fach drist. Mae gan yr arth bentwr o lyfrau. Tybed a fydd darllen stori'n codi calon yr arth fach? Will reading a story help to cheer up a sad little bear.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Chwedlau Tinga Tinga
channel.desc: Straeon lliwgar o Affrica am anifeiliaid y byd. Heddiw cawn glywed pam mae Rheino'n rhuthro. Today, we find out why Rhino charges.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Olobobs
channel.desc: Mae Crensh wedi creu llyfrgell newydd ond does dim llawer o lyfrau ynddi. Crensh has started a library but there aren't many books in it.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Egin Bach
channel.desc: Mae Septo'n mynd yn styc yn y mwd, tra bod Ato'n rhoi cynnig ar toboganio mwd, a Pico'n credu bod yr awyr yn cwympo. Pico thinks the sky is falling and Nano is just excited by the conkers.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Twm Twrch
channel.desc: Mae Llyfryn wedi rhwygo un o'i dudalennau wrth chwarae cuddio ac wedi dechrau byhafio'n rhyfedd a chreu swynion od. Llyfryn has started to behave strangely, making odd and weird spells.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Annibendod
channel.desc: Mae Bochau wedi cael llond bol ar fwyta bresych, ac felly'n codi pac ac yn mynd ar ei wyliau i Fferm Ty Mawr! Bochau is fed up with eating cabbage all night and day and heads for the farm.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Blero'n Mynd i Ocido
channel.desc: A Fydd Blero'n llwyddo i reoli'r crynu yn fol er mwyn perfformio fflip driphlyg yn y syrcas? Can Blero conquer his tummy flutters so he can perform a triple flip at the Ocido circus.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
channel.desc: Timau o Ysgol Cwm Gwyddon sy'n ymuno ? Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Cwm Gwyddon join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Nos Da Cyw
channel.desc: Cyfres o straeon bach cyn cysgu. Heddiw, Dylan Ebenezer sy'n darllen Bolgi ac Owi yn Mynd i'r Parc. Series of bedtime stories. Today, Dylan Ebenezer reads Bolgi ac Owi yn Mynd i'r Parc.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
channel.desc: Mae Persi yn cyhoeddi ei fod yn rhoi'r gorau i'w Beiriant Dychryn, gan ei fod yn rhy hen ar ei gyfer nawr. Persi announces he is giving up his Ghost Scaring Machine, as he is too old for it.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Ahoi!
channel.desc: Heddiw, m?r-ladron o Ysgol Bronllwyn sy'n ymuno ? Ben Dant a Cadi i herio Capten Cnec. Today, pirates from Ysgol Bronllwyn join Ben Dant and Cadi to challenge the smelly Capten Cnec.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Octonots
channel.desc: Mae Harri yn gwarchod aligator bach ond pan fydd hwnnw'n dianc o'r Octofad, rhaid i Harri a gweddill yr Octonots ei achub. Harri adopts a baby alligator but it escapes.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Sigldigwt
channel.desc: Mae Gwesty Sigldigwt ar agor! Heddiw cawn gwrdd ? Dilys y cocyrpw ac Aneira a'i chrwbanod. Today we meet Dilys the cockerpoo and Aneira and her tortoises.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Brethyn a Fflwff
channel.desc: Mae gan Fflwff reddf am guddio ac yn mwynhau dilyn Brethyn o gwmpas heb iddo sylwi! Fluff has an instinct for hiding and gets a big kick out of following Tweedy without him noticing.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Ein Byd Bach...
channel.desc: Byddwn yn dysgu am awyrennau yn y bennod yma, a phwy wnaeth ddyfeisio ac adeiladu'r awyren gyntaf. We'll learn about Aeroplanes in this episode, and about who invented the first one.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Byd Tad-cu
channel.desc: 'Beth yw llosgfynydd?' yw cwestiwn Gweni heddiw. Mae gan Tad-cu ateb dwl am Pegi'r Pengwin oedd eisiau bod yn gogydd byd-enwog! Gweni asks 'What is a volcano?' and Grandpa spins a tale.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Crawc a'i Ffrindiau
channel.desc: Pan fydd Crawc yn penderfynu gwersylla ar lan yr afon, mae'r gwenc?od yn achub ar y cyfle i gymryd drosodd y Crawcdy. The weasels grab an opportunity to take over Toad Hall. Poor Toad.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Kim a C?t a Twrch
channel.desc: Mae Kim a C?t yn chwilio am Twrch gyda'u ffrind newydd Mwydyn. Kim and C?t are looking for Twrch with their new friend Mwydyn.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Caru Canu a Stori
channel.desc: Hynt a Helynt Moi'r Mochyn Daear a'i barti pen-blwydd munud olaf sydd gan Cari i ni heddiw. Today's stori is about Moi the Badger's last minute birthday party.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Sion y Chef
channel.desc: uh-oh! Si?n offers to do Magi's chores on the farm, but soon finds it's not that easy.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Jen a Jim a'r Cywiadur
channel.desc: Mae Seth y ci fferm yn cyfarth byth a hefyd a does neb yn gwybod pam! Seth the dog is barking a lot and nobody knows why! I wonder if Jen and Jim can work out why Seth is barking.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Chwedlau Tinga Tinga
channel.desc: Straeon lliwgar o Affrica am anifeiliaid y byd. Heddiw cawn glywed mae Sgwarnog yn hopian. Today we find out why Hare hops.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Olobobs
channel.desc: Mae'r Olobos yn dyfeisio g?m newydd o'r enw Bobl-b?l, ond pan fo'r b?l yn byrstio mae angen help llaw Byrbi. The Olobobs invent a new game but when their ball bursts they need some help.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Egin Bach
channel.desc: Gall Tera ddim neidio dros y llysiau fel y gall Ato ond ma'n gweld y gall madarch ei helpu i fownso. Tera can't leapfrog over veggies like Atto, but he finds mushrooms that help her bounce.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Twm Twrch
channel.desc: Mae Mr a Mrs Twrch yn mynd ar eu gwyliau, ac mae Twm Twrch yn gwahodd Mishmosh draw i aros. Mr and Mrs Twrch are going on holiday for the weekend, and Twm Twrch invites Mishmosh to stay.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Annibendod
channel.desc: Mae Mrs Moss wedi cyrraedd rownd derfynol gwobr Pennaeth Gorau Cymru. Mae Miss Enfys wedi rhoi Anni yng ngofal trefnu'r parti! Mrs Moss has reached the finals of the Best Welsh Head prize.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Blero'n Mynd i Ocido
channel.desc: Mae Blero'n dysgu faint o sebon sy'n ormod wrth ymweld ? thy golchi Ocido. Blero learns just how much soap is too much when he travels to the launderette.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
channel.desc: Timau o Ysgol Ynys Wen sy'n ymuno ? Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Ynys Wen join Pwdryn and Melys to play a series of candyland themed games.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Newyddion S4C
channel.desc: Newyddion C a'r Tywydd. C News and Weather.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Colleen Ramsey
channel.desc: Tro hwn, mae Colleen yn dangos prydiau sy'n defnyddio cynnwys er mwyn osgoi gwastraff. Mae ei ffrind gorau Rachel yn dod i gael cyri. Colleen shows us how to use ingredients to avoid waste.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Heno
channel.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Sain Ffagan
channel.desc: Mae hi'n ddiwrnod prysura'r flwyddyn wrth i ddegau o filoedd o ymwelwyr gyrraedd i fwynhau'r wyl fwyd. It's food festival time and the 100-year-old slates on the Vulcan hotel need replacing.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Cefn Gwlad
channel.desc: Cwrddwn ?'r postmon Gerallt Jones a'r syrf?wr Emyr Hughes, ffrindiau o Langefni sy'n cadw, hyfforddi a rasio colomennod. We meet a duo from Llangefni who race pigeons with intense rivalry.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Newyddion S4C
channel.desc: Newyddion C a'r Tywydd. C News and Weather.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Prynhawn Da
channel.desc: Cyfres gylchgrawn gydag eitemau coginio a ffasiwn a chyngor am bopeth o addurno'ch cartref i ddewis llyfr da. Magazine series including features on fashion, style, antiques and cookery.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Newyddion S4C
channel.desc: Newyddion C a'r Tywydd. C News and Weather.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Radio Fa'ma
channel.desc: Tara a Kris sy'n sgwrsio gyda phobl Y Rhyl am brofiadau sydd wedi effeithio ar eu bywydau. The duo chat with the people of Rhyl about experiences which have had an impact on their lives.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Egin Bach
channel.desc: Mae Septo'n ceisio glanhau llwybr llysnafedd, ond mae gan Tera syniadau eraill. Zepto tries cleaning a snail trail, but Tera has other ideas. Milli can't reach a giant daisy to smell it.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Tomos a'i Ffrindau
channel.desc: Mae Persi yn ofni ymgymryd ?'i ddanfoniadau post ar Calan Gaeaf oherwydd y Tr?n Sgrech. Persi is afraid to deliver mail on Halloween because of the Ghost Train.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Twm Twrch
channel.desc: Mae Dorti a Twm Twrch yn mynd ar daith i ddarganfod beth yw'r golau rhyfedd a welodd Twm Twrch. Dorti and Twm Twrch go on a mission to find out what the strange light Twm Twrch saw.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Ein Byd Bach...
channel.desc: Yn y rhaglen yma byddwn yn dysgu am yr awyr a beth sy'n neud yr awyr yn las. Today, we'll look at the different types of cloud and we'll learn more about Thunder and Lightning.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Dal Dy Ddannedd
channel.desc: Timau o Ysgol Dyffryn Y Glowyr sy'n ymuno ? Pwdryn a Melys i chwarae llond trol o gemau lliwgar! Teams from Ysgol Dyffryn Y Glowyr join Pwdryn and Melys to play some candyland games.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Y Doniolis
channel.desc: Y tro hwn, mae Luigi yn perswadio Louie i aros dros nos ym mhlas Cwm Doniol, sy'n llawn ysbrydion. This time, Luigi persuades Louie to stay overnight at Cwm Doniol's haunted house.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Li Ban
channel.desc: Mae Li ban a Dyf yn cyfarfod ? Mari ar y gwch bysgota wrth iddi gystadlu'n erbyn Dynion Glas y Minsh. Li Ban and Dyf meet Mari on the boat as she goes up against the Blue Men of the Minch.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Criw'r Cwt
channel.desc: Mae Madrin wedi'i glymu ar ben cerflun yn sgw?r y dref ac mae ei miawio yn gyrru'r cocatws yn wallgof. Madrin is stuck up on on the top of a sculpture in the town square.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Mwy o Stwnsh Sadwrn
channel.desc: Cipolwg yn ?l dros rai o uchafbwyntiau rhaglen dydd Sadwrn. Tune in to relive some of the highlights of Saturday's programme.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Bois y Pizza
channel.desc: O'r diwedd - mae'r bois yn cyrraedd yr Eidal. Cartre' pizzas. Ydy Smokey Pete yn barod am her heolydd y brifddinas? Finally, the boys arrive in Italy; the spiritual home of the pizza.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Sgorio
channel.desc: Colwyn Bay v Barry Town United & the Genero Adran Premier fixture between Wrexham and The New Saints.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Heno
channel.desc: Rhaglen gylchgrawn nosweithiol gyda straeon o bob cwr o Gymru. Nightly magazine with stories from all over Wales and special guests.

channel.title: Newyddion S4C
channel.desc: Newyddion C a'r Tywydd. C News and Weather.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Pobol y Cwm
channel.desc: Mae cyfrinach Eileen yn faich ar y chwiorydd Beaujolais, ond sut fydd Sion yn ymateb i'r gwir? Eileen confesses everything, but how will Sion react to the betrayal.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Rownd a Rownd
channel.desc: one of them will need to be discussed in detail.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Newyddion S4C
channel.desc: Newyddion C a'r Tywydd. C News and Weather.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Ymgyrch Seal Bay
channel.desc: Stori'r bobl leol wnaeth rwystro cynllwyn smyglo cyffuriau enfawr yn Nhrefdraeth ym 1983. Story of the local people who thwarted a huge drug-smuggling plot in Newport, Pembs, in 1983.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Clwb Rygbi
channel.desc: Uchafbwyntiau bob g?m o'r rownd ddiweddaraf Super Rygbi Cymru. Highlights of every game from the latest round of Super Rygbi Cymru. English language commentary is also available.

channel.name: S4C UK
channel.title: Y Frwydr
channel.desc: Mae'r actor Mared Jarman yn mynd ar daith i ddysgu am hanes anabledd yng Nghymru. Actress Mared Jarman goes on a journey to learn about the history of disability in Wales.[(96057)]

channel.name: Thrill ID
channel.title: The Windmill Massacre
channel.desc: Jennifer mengikuti tur kincir angin yang terkenal di Belanda. Kemudian, beberapa anggota tur tiba-tiba menghilang. Jennifer pun menemukan suatu rahasia yang menghubungkan nasib mereka dalam suatu fakta yang mengerikan.

channel.name: Thrill ID
channel.title: Inside The Boys
channel.desc: Sebuah kampus diselimuti oleh teror ketika beberapa mahasiswa kedokteran mengalami serangkaian kejadian yang menyeramkan setelah pergi dari kamar mayat pada tengah malam.

channel.name: Thrill ID
channel.title: Chapter 1
channel.desc: Mae Nak si hantu kembali membalas dendam atas seorang wanita hamil yang mengalami pelecehan seksual dan kehilangan bayinya. Ia berubah menjadi sesosok roh jahat untuk menghukum si pelaku atas perbuatan jahatnya.

channel.name: Thrill ID
channel.title: 3AM
channel.desc: Seorang wanita di rumah sakit menemukan perselingkuhan suaminya dan bertemu dengan korban lain dari hubungan gelap tersebut. Apakah korban tersebut hanyalah khayalan dari imajinasinya atau roh pendendam?

channel.name: Thrill ID
channel.title: Sinister Doll
channel.desc: Pelangi tiba di sebuah perkebunan pohon pisang yang dijaga oleh lelaki tua nan misterius dan berhasil mengungkap rahasia nan mengerikan tentang seorang gadis yang dikubur di perkebunan tersebut puluhan tahun silam.

channel.name: Thrill ID
channel.title: Ten Minutes To Midnight
channel.desc: Seorang pembawa acara radio larut malam digigit oleh seekor kelelawar nan gila, lalu meneror rekan-rekannya saat ia perlahan berubah menjadi sesosok vampir.

channel.name: Thrill ID
channel.title: The Windmill Massacre
channel.desc: Jennifer mengikuti tur kincir angin yang terkenal di Belanda. Kemudian, beberapa anggota tur tiba-tiba menghilang. Jennifer pun menemukan suatu rahasia yang menghubungkan nasib mereka dalam suatu fakta yang mengerikan.

channel.name: Thrill ID
channel.title: Green Wood Robbery
channel.desc: Berlatar di masa-masa awal Republik Tiongkok, keluarga Kang yang kaya dibunuh dengan sadis dan putri mereka hilang secara misterius. Selama puluhan tahun, arwah di rumah Kang di Green Wood Lane masih menghantui.

channel.name: Thrill ID
channel.title: Sinister
channel.desc: Seorang mahasiswi jurusan drama yang kesulitan membayar uang kuliah, Jing Wen, mengambil pekerjaan sebagai model. Ia menjadi model untuk seorang seniman misterius yang mengkhususkan diri pada ekspresi tubuh manusia.

channel.name: Thrill ID
channel.title: Bahay Na Pula
channel.desc: Jane dan suaminya, Marco, pergi ke rumah leluhur yang diwarisi Jane dari neneknya. Saat mereka pindah ke rumah itu, Jane mulai mengalami berbagai kejadian mengerikan dan perutnya secara misterius membesar setiap hari.

channel.name: Thrill ID
channel.title: Sinister
channel.desc: Si Nan dan suaminya pergi ke Kuala Lumpur untuk berlibur demi menghilangkan stres akan kehamilannya. Namun, ia segera menyadari rencana jahat sang suami yang ingin mengubah anak mereka menjadi Luk Krok.

channel.name: Thrill ID
channel.title: The Case Of Disappearances
channel.desc: Kepercayaan terhadap kutukan Kaisar Jing Lung meningkat kala semakin banyaknya penduduk desa yang tewas. Wen Jie pun bekerja sama dengan kepala keamanan untuk mengungkap konspirasi itu dan melindungi penduduk desa.

channel.name: Thrill ID
channel.title: Evie
channel.desc: Evie tak menyadari bahwa terdapat kekuatan jahat pada kalung yang ia temukan di pantai. Ia pun secara tak sengaja membangunkan sesosok iblis air nan mematikan ketika kekuatan gelap kalung tersebut muncul.

channel.title: Renegade

channel.name: Z Living US
channel.title: The Adventures of Ozzie & Harriet
channel.desc: Long-running sitcom "The Adventures of Ozzie and Harriet," based on a radio show of the same name, is one of the shows from the period that epitomized the values of the 1950s and early '60s through the all-American nuclear family. The series stars real-life married couple Ozzie and Harriet Nelson as well as their sons, David and Ricky. The focus of the series is the Nelsons' home life as they deal with run-of-the-mill problems that families of the day faced. By the time the show went off the air, it had produced 435 episodes over 14 seasons.
